        public static java.util.List<Media> getAllMedia(UserType userType)
        Get a list of all media in the database appropriate to the given user type.
        Parameters:
        userType - Type of user to get media for, used for filtering.
        Returns:
        List of user-appropriate media

        Returns:

      • addUser

        public static void addUser(User user)
                    throws UsernameTakenException
        Add a new user to the database
        Parameters:
        user - The user to add
        Throws:
        UsernameTakenException - if the user's name has already been taken.

      • removeUser

        public static void removeUser(User user)
        Removes a user from the database, which name matches the parameter's name
        Parameters:
        user - The user to remove

      • save

        public static void save()
                 throws DatabaseIOException
        Save the database to the disk.
        Throws:
        DatabaseIOException - if the database couldn't be saved to disk

                 throws DatabaseIOException
